rooms.name: Shipwreck
rooms.description:
You are the captain of a ship headed on a treacherous journey to find treasure. You are sailing with your crew
when suddenly a storm hits. You hear a loud boom and see water flooding in. You are stuck in the cabin of a sinking ship. Find
your way out for you and your crew before it submerges completely! You have 30 minutes. Good luck!

Pick puzzles to play. Find keys to unlock doors and new puzzles to solve the way out.
Type 'M' to access the menu to get hints, pause the game, or look at stats.

rooms.name: Prison
rooms.description:
You are going about your day when you hear sirens outside of your home. You are suddenly taken away and thrown into
a high-security prison. You have no idea why you were taken or who took you. You need to find a way to escape before it's too late.
You have 30 minutes to find your way out of the prison and back to safety. Good luck!

Pick puzzles to play. Find keys to unlock doors and new puzzles to solve the way out.
Type 'M' to access the menu to get hints, pause the game, or look at stats.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description:
You are on a trip to the mountains with your friends. While hiking through the forest, you get separated from
your group and lose your way. As night falls, you realize you need to find shelter and a way back before it gets too dark. You find
a small cabin and need to find clues to get out of the woods before time runs out. You have 30 minutes to find your way out of the forest and reunite with your friends. Good luck!

Pick puzzles to play. Find keys to unlock doors and new puzzles to solve the way out.
Type 'M' to access the menu to get hints, pause the game, or look at stats.
